I would like to see them try to defy us if we are all conscious of our actions.... they won’t be able to. That’s our future! So please focus on the real problem... it’s called TRASH! And the physical trash is just a reflection of the trash in our minds. Those little pieces of negativity that are contaminating your life that you don’t even pay attention too. Start paying attention to the minuscule pieces of trash that you walk over every day... realize that you CAN and SHOULD pick them up and put them in a trash bin. Clean your path! Be the change! Clean our world! Clean your mind! And see what happens.
